mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT r.*, u.name as name, ROWNUM as rn FROM report r JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.id WHERE r.board_id = #{boardId} AND r.status = 1 )
select id, title, content,user_id from board where id= #{boardId}
mapper.update: update board b set is_deleted = 1 where b.id = #{id}
update report r set status = 0 where r.board_id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board b INNER JOIN report r ON b.id = r.board_id WHERE b.is_deleted = 0 AND r.status = 1 GROUP BY b.content, r.board_id, b.user_id )
SELECT COUNT(*) AS row_count FROM report r JOIN board b ON r.board_id = b.id WHERE b.is_deleted = 0 AND r.status = 1
